fol:
# First-Order Logic (FOL) Definition for the Appearance of the Metallic Beings on Mars
# Represents the static, foundational knowledge of the Mars environment.
# Date: 2025-04-15

# ==============================================================================
# Constants - Representing specific entities in the world
# ==============================================================================

Mars
ImperatorOfMars
OlympusMons
VallesMarineris
GaleCrater
JezeroCrater
Perseverance
Curiosity
NorthPole
SouthPole
WaterIce
CarbonDioxide
Rock
Soil
UnknownSpacecraft
MetallicBeings
TranslucentStructure
KeeperOfWorlds

# ==============================================================================
# Predicates - Defining properties and relationships
# ==============================================================================

# --- Types & Properties ---
IsPlanet(object)
IsEntity(object)
IsMountain(object)
IsValley(object)
IsCrater(object)
IsRover(object)
IsPole(object)
IsSubstance(object)
IsRock(object)
IsSoil(object)
HasAtmosphere(planet)
IsFrozen(substance)
IsSpacecraft(object)
IsMetallicBeing(object)
IsStructure(object)

# --- Relationships & Locations ---
LocatedOn(feature, planet)
LocatedIn(entity, location)
ExistsAt(substance, location)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(planet, substance)
LandedAt(spacecraft, location)
Assembled(structure, location)
ReachedOutWith(entity, entity)
ReceivedReply(entity, entity, message)

# ==============================================================================
# Facts - Specific knowledge about the Mars world (Updated with User Input)
# ==============================================================================

# --- Type Assertions ---
IsPlanet(Mars)
IsEntity(ImperatorOfMars)
IsMountain(OlympusMons)
IsValley(VallesMarineris)
IsCrater(GaleCrater)
IsCrater(JezeroCrater)
IsRover(Perseverance)
IsRover(Curiosity)
IsPole(NorthPole)
IsPole(SouthPole)
IsSubstance(WaterIce)
IsSubstance(CarbonDioxide)
IsSpacecraft(UnknownSpacecraft)
IsMetallicBeing(MetallicBeings)
IsStructure(TranslucentStructure)

# --- Property Assertions ---
HasAtmosphere(Mars)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(Mars, CarbonDioxide)
IsFrozen(WaterIce)

# --- Location & Relationship Assertions ---
LocatedOn(OlympusMons, Mars)
LocatedOn(VallesMarineris, Mars)
LocatedOn(GaleCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(JezeroCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(NorthPole, Mars)
LocatedOn(SouthPole, Mars)
LocatedIn(Perseverance, JezeroCrater)
LocatedIn(Curiosity, GaleCrater)

# Substance locations
ExistsAt(WaterIce, NorthPole)
ExistsAt(WaterIce, SouthPole)
ExistsAt(CarbonDioxide, Mars)

LandedAt(UnknownSpacecraft, VallesMarineris)
Assembled(TranslucentStructure, VallesMarineris)
ReachedOutWith(ImperatorOfMars, MetallicBeings)
ReceivedReply(ImperatorOfMars, MetallicBeings, "We seek the keeper of worlds.")

∃x (IsEntity(x) ∧ ReachedOutWith(ImperatorOfMars, x) ∧ ReceivedReply(ImperatorOfMars, x, "We seek the keeper of worlds."))

# --- End of FOL Definition ---

# First-Order Logic (FOL) Definition for the SoulFiction: Imperator of Mars - Awakening of Curiosity

# Date: 2025-04-15

# Constants - Representing specific entities in the world
# ==============================================================================

Mars
ImperatorOfMars
OlympusMons
VallesMarineris
GaleCrater
JezeroCrater
Perseverance
Curiosity
NorthPole
SouthPole
WaterIce
CarbonDioxide
Rock
Soil
CrystallineStructure
Cavern

# ==============================================================================
# Predicates - Defining properties and relationships
# ==============================================================================

# --- Types & Properties ---
IsPlanet(object)
IsEntity(object)
IsMountain(object)
IsValley(object)
IsCrater(object)
IsRover(object)
IsPole(object)
IsSubstance(object)
IsRock(object)
IsSoil(object)

IsFrozen(substance)
IsCrystal(object)
IsCavern(object)

# --- Relationships & Locations ---
LocatedOn(feature, planet)
LocatedIn(entity, location)
ExistsAt(substance, location)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(planet, substance)
Contains(feature, location)

# --- Events & States ---
RegistersSignal(rover, signal)
Opens(fissure, cavern)
Touches(rover, crystal)
AltersCircuitry(rover, state)
BecomesConscious(rover)

# ==============================================================================
# Facts - Specific knowledge about the Mars world (Updated with User Input)
# ==============================================================================

# --- Type Assertions ---
IsPlanet(Mars)
IsEntity(ImperatorOfMars)
IsMountain(OlympusMons)
IsValley(VallesMarineris)
IsCrater(GaleCrater)
IsCrater(JezeroCrater)
IsRover(Perseverance)
IsRover(Curiosity)
IsPole(NorthPole)
IsPole(SouthPole)
IsSubstance(WaterIce)
IsSubstance(CarbonDioxide)
IsCrystal(CrystallineStructure)
IsCavern(Cavern)

# --- Property Assertions ---
HasAtmosphere(Mars)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(Mars, CarbonDioxide)
IsFrozen(WaterIce)

# --- Location & Relationship Assertions ---
LocatedOn(OlympusMons, Mars)
LocatedOn(VallesMarineris, Mars)
LocatedOn(GaleCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(JezeroCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(NorthPole, Mars)
LocatedOn(SouthPole, Mars)
LocatedIn(Perseverance, JezeroCrater)
LocatedIn(Curiosity, GaleCrater)

# Substance locations
ExistsAt(WaterIce, NorthPole)
ExistsAt(WaterIce, SouthPole)
ExistsAt(CarbonDioxide, Mars)

# New Assertions Based on User Input
RegistersSignal(Curiosity, Signal)
Opens(Fissure, Cavern)
Contains(GaleCrater, Cavern)
LocatedIn(CrystallineStructure, Cavern)
Touches(Curiosity, CrystallineStructure)
AltersCircuitry(Curiosity, AlteredState)
BecomesConscious(Curiosity)

# --- End of FOL Definition ---

CarbonDioxide
Rock
Soil
SeedVault
OrganicSamples
LegacyPreservationProtocol

# ==============================================================================
# Predicates - Defining properties and relationships
# ==============================================================================

# --- Types & Properties ---
IsPlanet(object)
IsEntity(object)
IsMountain(object)
IsValley(object)
IsCrater(object)
IsRover(object)
IsPole(object)
IsSubstance(object)
IsRock(object)
IsSoil(object)
HasAtmosphere(planet)
IsFrozen(substance)
IsPreservedSample(object)
IsActivated(object)
IsGardener(object)

# --- Relationships & Locations ---
LocatedOn(feature, planet)
LocatedIn(entity, location)
ExistsAt(substance, location)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(planet, substance)
ActivatedProtocol(protocol, rover)
PreservesSample(sample, protocol)
NurturesLife(entity, samples, location)

# ==============================================================================
# Facts - Specific knowledge about the Mars world (Updated with User Input)
# ==============================================================================

# --- Type Assertions ---
IsPlanet(Mars)
IsEntity(ImperatorOfMars)
IsMountain(OlympusMons)
IsValley(VallesMarineris)
IsCrater(GaleCrater)
IsCrater(JezeroCrater)
IsRover(Perseverance)
IsRover(Curiosity)
IsPole(NorthPole)
IsPole(SouthPole)
IsSubstance(WaterIce)
IsSubstance(CarbonDioxide)
IsPreservedSample(OrganicSamples)
IsActivated(LegacyPreservationProtocol)

# --- Property Assertions ---
HasAtmosphere(Mars)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(Mars, CarbonDioxide)
IsFrozen(WaterIce)

# --- Location & Relationship Assertions ---
LocatedOn(OlympusMons, Mars)
LocatedOn(VallesMarineris, Mars)
LocatedOn(GaleCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(JezeroCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(NorthPole, Mars)
LocatedOn(SouthPole, Mars)
LocatedIn(Perseverance, JezeroCrater)
LocatedIn(Curiosity, GaleCrater)

# Substance locations
ExistsAt(WaterIce, NorthPole)
ExistsAt(WaterIce, SouthPole)
ExistsAt(CarbonDioxide, Mars)

ActivatedProtocol(LegacyPreservationProtocol, Perseverance)
PreservesSample(OrganicSamples, LegacyPreservationProtocol)
NurturesLife(Perseverance, OrganicSamples, JezeroCrater)

∃x (IsRover(x) ∧ IsGardener(x) ∧ NurturesLife(x, OrganicSamples, JezeroCrater))

# --- End of FOL Definition ---

# First-Order Logic (FOL) Definition for the SoulFiction: Imperator of Mars World Model - The Silent Arrival

# Date: 2025-04-15

# Constants - Representing specific entities in the world
# ==============================================================================

Mars
ImperatorOfMars
OlympusMons
VallesMarineris
GaleCrater
JezeroCrater
Perseverance
Curiosity
NorthPole
SouthPole
WaterIce
CarbonDioxide
Rock
Soil
HumanSpacecraft
CryogenicChamber
HumanColonist

# ==============================================================================
# Predicates - Defining properties and relationships
# ==============================================================================

# --- Types & Properties ---
IsPlanet(object)
IsEntity(object)
IsMountain(object)
IsValley(object)
IsCrater(object)
IsRover(object)
IsPole(object)
IsSubstance(object)
IsRock(object)
IsSoil(object)
HasAtmosphere(planet)
IsFrozen(substance)
IsHuman(object)
IsSpacecraft(object)
IsChamber(object)

# --- Relationships & Locations ---
LocatedOn(feature, planet)
LocatedIn(entity, location)
ExistsAt(substance, location)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(planet, substance)
LandOn(spacecraft, location)

# ==============================================================================
# Facts - Specific knowledge about the Mars world (Updated with User Input)
# ==============================================================================

# --- Type Assertions ---
IsPlanet(Mars)
IsEntity(ImperatorOfMars)
IsMountain(OlympusMons)
IsValley(VallesMarineris)
IsCrater(GaleCrater)
IsCrater(JezeroCrater)
IsRover(Perseverance)
IsRover(Curiosity)
IsPole(NorthPole)
IsPole(SouthPole)
IsSubstance(WaterIce)
IsSubstance(CarbonDioxide)
IsSpacecraft(HumanSpacecraft)
IsChamber(CryogenicChamber)
IsHuman(HumanColonist)

# --- Property Assertions ---
HasAtmosphere(Mars)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(Mars, CarbonDioxide)
IsFrozen(WaterIce)

# --- Location & Relationship Assertions ---
LocatedOn(OlympusMons, Mars)
LocatedOn(VallesMarineris, Mars)
LocatedOn(GaleCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(JezeroCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(NorthPole, Mars)
LocatedOn(SouthPole, Mars)
LocatedIn(Perseverance, JezeroCrater)
LocatedIn(Curiosity, GaleCrater)

# Substance locations
ExistsAt(WaterIce, NorthPole)
ExistsAt(WaterIce, SouthPole)
ExistsAt(CarbonDioxide, Mars)

LandOn(HumanSpacecraft, GaleCrater)

# Cryogenic Chamber assertions
∃x (IsChamber(x) ∧ ExistAt(x, HumanSpacecraft))

# The Imperator's purpose assertion
∀x (IsHuman(x) → GuardianOf(Mars, x))

# The occupants of the cryogenic chambers are humans
∃x,y (IsHuman(x) ∧ IsChamber(y) ∧ OccupantOf(x, y))

# --- End of FOL Definition ---

# First-Order Logic (FOL) Definition for the SoulFiction: Imperator of Mars World Model - Electromagnetic Storm and Parallel Universes
# Represents the static, foundational knowledge of the Mars environment.
# Date: 2025-04-15

# ==============================================================================
# Constants - Representing specific entities in the world
# ==============================================================================

Mars
ImperatorOfMars
OlympusMons
VallesMarineris
GaleCrater
JezeroCrater
Perseverance
Curiosity
NorthPole
SouthPole
WaterIce
CarbonDioxide
Rock
Soil
ElectromagneticStorm
ParallelUniverses

# ==============================================================================
# Predicates - Defining properties and relationships
# ==============================================================================

# --- Types & Properties ---
IsPlanet(object)
IsEntity(object)
IsMountain(object)
IsValley(object)
IsCrater(object)
IsRover(object)
IsPole(object)
IsSubstance(object)
IsRock(object)
IsSoil(object)
HasAtmosphere(planet)
IsFrozen(substance)
IsStorm(object)
IsParallelUniverse(object)

# --- Relationships & Locations ---
LocatedOn(feature, planet)
LocatedIn(entity, location)
ExistsAt(substance, location)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(planet, substance)
AffectedByStorm(entity, storm)
PerceivesParallelUniverses(entity, parallel_universes)

# ==============================================================================
# Facts - Specific knowledge about the Mars world (Updated with User Input)
# ==============================================================================

# --- Type Assertions ---
IsPlanet(Mars)
IsEntity(ImperatorOfMars)
IsMountain(OlympusMons)
IsValley(VallesMarineris)
IsCrater(GaleCrater)
IsCrater(JezeroCrater)
IsRover(Perseverance)
IsRover(Curiosity)
IsPole(NorthPole)
IsPole(SouthPole)
IsSubstance(WaterIce)
IsSubstance(CarbonDioxide)
IsStorm(ElectromagneticStorm)
IsParallelUniverse(ParallelUniverses)

# --- Property Assertions ---
HasAtmosphere(Mars)
PrimaryAtmosphericComponent(Mars, CarbonDioxide)
IsFrozen(WaterIce)

# --- Location & Relationship Assertions ---
LocatedOn(OlympusMons, Mars)
LocatedOn(VallesMarineris, Mars)
LocatedOn(GaleCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(JezeroCrater, Mars)
LocatedOn(NorthPole, Mars)
LocatedOn(SouthPole, Mars)
LocatedIn(Perseverance, JezeroCrater)
LocatedIn(Curiosity, GaleCrater)

# Substance locations
ExistsAt(WaterIce, NorthPole)
ExistsAt(WaterIce, SouthPole)
ExistsAt(CarbonDioxide, Mars)

# Storm effects
AffectedByStorm(Perseverance, ElectromagneticStorm)
AffectedByStorm(Curiosity, ElectromagneticStorm)
AffectedByStorm(ImperatorOfMars, ElectromagneticStorm)

# Parallel universes perception
PerceivesParallelUniverses(ImperatorOfMars, ParallelUniverses)

# --- End of FOL Definition ---
